languages.text: "Если ваша дипломатия действительно остановит мятеж, то попытаться стоит. Чем меньше жертв, тем лучше".
"If your diplomacy truly can stop the riot, it is worth a try. The fewer deaths, the better."
languages.original_text: "Если ваша дипломатия действительно остановит мятеж, то попытаться стоит. Чем меньше жертв, тем лучше".

traits.locale_text: "If your diplomacy truly can stop the riot, it is worth a try. The fewer deaths there are, the better."
"If your diplomacy truly can stop the riot, it is worth a try. The fewer deaths there are, the better."
"If your diplomacy truly can stop the riot, it is worth a try. The fewer deaths there are, the better."
"If your diplomacy truly can stop the riot, it is worth a try. The fewer deaths there are, the better."
"If your diplomacy truly can stop the riot, it is worth a try. The fewer deaths, the better."
"If your diplomacy truly can stop the riot, it is worth a try. The fewer deaths, the better."

languages.text: «Si puede sofocar la revuelta haciendo uso de su diplomacia, merece la pena intentarlo. Cuantas menos bajas, mejor».
languages.original_text: "If your diplomacy truly can stop the riot, it is worth a try. The fewer deaths, the better."

traits.locale_text: «Si puede sofocar la revuelta haciendo uso de su diplomacia, merece la pena intentarlo. Cuantas menos bajas, mejor».

languages.text: "Wenn Eure Diplomatie tatsächlich einen Aufstand beenden kann, ist es einen Versuch wert. Je weniger Tote, desto besser."
languages.original_text: "If your diplomacy truly can stop the riot, it is worth a try. The fewer deaths, the better."

traits.locale_text: "Wenn Eure Diplomatie tatsächlich einen Aufstand beenden kann, ist es einen Versuch wert. Je weniger Tote, desto besser."

languages.text: « Si vos talents de diplomate peuvent réellement mettre un terme à cette révolte, ça vaut la peine d'essayer. L'essentiel, c'est de limiter les morts. »
languages.original_text: "If your diplomacy truly can stop the riot, it is worth a try. The fewer deaths, the better."

traits.locale_text: « Si vos talents de diplomate peuvent réellement mettre un terme à cette révolte, ça vaut la peine d'essayer. L'essentiel, c'est de limiter les morts. »

languages.text: “如果你的外交手段真的能阻止这场暴乱，那就值得一试。死的人越少越好。”
languages.original_text: "If your diplomacy truly can stop the riot, it is worth a try. The fewer deaths, the better."

traits.locale_text: “如果你的外交手段真的能阻止这场暴乱，那就值得一试。死的人越少越好。”

languages.text: 「君が交渉することで本当に暴動を止められるなら、試してみる価値はあるな。死人は少ない方が良い」
languages.original_text: "If your diplomacy truly can stop the riot, it is worth a try. The fewer deaths, the better."

traits.locale_text: 「君の交渉で本当に暴動を止められるなら、試してみる価値はある。死者は少ない方が良い」
「君が交渉することで本当に暴動を止められるなら、試してみる価値はあるな。死人は少ない方が良い」

languages.text: "Diplomasi çabanız gerçekten isyanı durdurabilecekse denemeye değer. Ne kadar az ölüm olursa o kadar iyi."
languages.original_text: "If your diplomacy truly can stop the riot, it is worth a try. The fewer deaths, the better."

traits.locale_text: "Diplomasi çabanız gerçekten isyanı durdurabilecekse denemeye değer. Ne kadar az ölüm olursa o kadar iyi."
